item.title: [TuT Help] PK OFF / PK ON [TuT Help]
item.dc:creator: @XxGANGSTAxX XxGANGSTAxX
item.description:
@XxGANGSTAxX wrote:

I need help with my server’s ::pkoff option… whenver i type ::pkoff it never works … heres the code, can someone help me ?

or tell me whats wrong with it

}
        if (command.startsWith("pkon") && playerRights >= 3) {
		IsAttacking = false;
		AttackingOn = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		IsUsingSkill = false;
	}
        if (command.startsWith("pkoff") && playerRights >= 3) {
		IsAttacking = false;
		AttackingOn = 1;
		resetAnimation();
		IsUsingSkill = true;
	}

Read full topic
